item.title: Getting Started with R, R Studio, and R Markdown
item.description: According to R Studio “R Markdown is a format that enables easy authoring of reproducible web reports from R. It combines the core syntax of Markdown (an easy-to-write plain text format for web content) with embedded R code chunks that are run so their output can be included in the final document”. From Penn State Statistics Introduction to creating dynamic R statistical reports in PDF or HTML:
